name: Overloading Chain
description:
This is my first game jam ever !!!. 

The GameZ 2022 - hosted by GameDevClub at HCMUT (Ho Chi Minh City University of Technology) - Making a game with a provided theme in 2 days.

The theme is "WATER". Therefore, I came up with the idea of building a simple water factory in which player has to control several pipes to fill the bottles with the required output.

Anyway, feel free to enjoy the game and thanks for supporting me.
